titleStmt.title: Christian liberty as it was soberly desired in a letter to certain forreign states upon occasion of their late severity to several of their inhabitants, meerly for their different perswasion and practice in point of faith and worship towards God / made publick on the behalf of the present suffering dissenters within this kingdom.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: London, the 14th December, 1674.
